summary: A old beggar from the woods secretly teaches Chien Fu kung fu as he can't afford regular classes and his "dad" doesn't want him fighting. He grows up, works as waiter and ends up fighting men from his town's crime syndicate.
cast: Jackie Chan|Siu-Tin Yuen|Hung-Lieh Chen|Dean Shek|Kwok-Choi Hon|Biao Yuen|Feng Tien|Yeong-Mun Kwon|Kwok-Kuen Chan|Kam Cheung|Shao-Lin Chiang|Chun Chin|Lu Chin|Yuet-Sang Chin|Feng Erh|Kuang-Lun Ho|Li-Nan Ho|Chin Hsu|Lo Kam|Chung Kwan|Chien Tang Ma|Mars|Pei-Pei Shu|Wah-Lung Szema|San Tai|Yuan-Pin Tao|Fat Wan|Chi-Ming Wong|Mei Wong|Hsi-Chun Yang|Hua Yang|Yat Chor Yuen
director: Directors: Mu Chu, Hai-Feng Wei (as Hoi-Fung Ngai)
title: La furia de Jackie
